definition: Unique identifier for sample site within a waterbody
Chlorophyll a concentration measured with sonde
Chlorophyll a measured with sonde optical sensor
Turbidity measured with sonde optical sensor
Phycocyanin measured with sonde optical sensor

1: failed post-deployment calibration check or value was otherwise suspicious. L: value is < reporting limit but > minimum detection limit. ND: analyte not detected and minimum detection limit reported. H: holding time violation. S: sampled warmed during shipping
